Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The next day, Ayla calls you to her studio.'}
{3: 'For some reason, you are blindfolded as you enter the studio.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't take off your blindfold just yet."}
{3: 'Ella pushes you into a chair.'}
{3: 'It seems like you have been moving for some time, but you get this sneaking suspicion that you are moving in circles.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm... If that's the case..."}
{3: 'You hear the electric buzzing of a projector turning on.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm... This isn't ideal..."}
{3: 'You hear the clicking of a button.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Just a few minor adjustments... Annnnd that should do it.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Alright, you can take off your blindfold.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: 'Is this... the bridge in Babylonia?'}
{3: 'You pushed me all the way here?'}
{3: 'Ayla wants to respond when the comms on your headset rings.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I didn't see you this morning. Everything okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You could say that.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Well, when you finish up, come to the bridge. Celica said...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Am I not already at the bridge?'}
{3: 'Wait, no. Seems like the night sky is a bit blurry.'}
{2: '(Extend hand to feel it)', 3: '31'}
{3: 'Feels like... a wall.'}
{3: 'There appears to be a wall about half a meter in front of you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Spacial immersion seems good enough, but the distance isn't fooling anyone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Looks like I can't just rely on pictures.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Ella toggles her personal terminal, and a white wall appears in front of her.'}
{3: 'Seems like this was parallax photography projected on the wall to create a sense of remote reality.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "If that's the case...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It seems to work in principle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Next up... I won't need to bother you anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'After all, how to frame the "question," that is left to the creator...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant? Are you there?', 4: '1'}
